Room.Name: Goblin Underground Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling through a long shadowy tunnel in the southern part of the goblin underground shrine.
Room.LongDescription: Torches flicker along the tunnel's walls providing the only means of light in the dark and dreary tunnel. The air becomes increasingly stale as you travel deeper into the goblin's domain. Closer examination of the walls reveal the surface to be quite rough, and filled with numerous small cracks and crevices. It appears this tunnel was carved in haste by crude tools. Then again goblins were never known for their architectural skill. The tunnel continues north, deeper into the heart of the goblin shrine.
